name: Peace for the Colony
description:
You're put in charge to start your own colony, but no one said it would be easy.

This game brings diverse events to give you a challenge but also make it fun. It has endless possibilities.

The game includes features like:

-Events to make or break your colony

-Diverse of enemies to attack and try to destroy your colony

-Plenty of items, buildings and gatherables to help expand your colony

Try to expand your colony to its fullest potential, but be ware, there'll be challenges.
